data.name: Pizza Delivery 3000
data.detailed_description:
Leap into your hovercraft, fire up the laser cannons, and prepare for the ultimate game of 31st century cat-and-mouse. Strap in tight - you play a delivery driver in a town where pizza has been outlawed. Blast your way through the local robot police force or use speed and wit to avoid their detection as you race against the clock to deliver to hungry townsfolk their favorite, forbidden cheesy meal. Delivering pizza has never been so dangerous!

  • Make deliveries in your hovercraft, which can be upgraded over time using tip money.
  • Race against the clock, collecting higher tips the faster you safely deliver a pizza.
  • Outrun and outwit the local robot police force or use your weapons to blast them enroute to your delivery.
  • Learn to navigate your way through a small town that expands as you progress in your mastery of the game.
  • Search for pages from the lost “Book of Za” to unlock powerful upgrades.
  • Collect supplies along the way to upgrade the kitchen and continue the flow of forbidden za.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
